title: Stats of Boston Marathons
text: bostonmarathonstats provides easy way analyze data runners finished Boston Marathon 2009 2022. boston_summary() summarises data year. boston_position searches athletes finished certain position. boston_country summarises data country. boston_athlete searches results athlete. boston_density_ridges() make density plot amount runners finishing time.

title: Stats of Boston Marathons
text: can install development version bostonmarathonstats GitHub :

title: Stats of Boston Marathons
text: basic example one functions package. boston_summary informs numbers finishers gender certain year event. first rows database results_boston used package called. data runners gender, residence information finishing time. package also function boston_density_ridges() make density plot finishing times:
code: library(bostonmarathonstats) boston_summary(gender = "Female", year = 2021) #> # A tibble: 1 × 7 #>   gender  year n_finishers mean_age n_countries fastest_time slowest_time #>   <chr>  <int>       <int>    <dbl>       <int> <Period>     <Period>     #> 1 Female  2021        7444     43.0          64 2H 24M 45S   7H 33M 22S head(results_boston, 5) |>    knitr::kable() #> Picking joint bandwidth of 74.7

what: Get basic data of an athlete that finish Boston Marathon. — boston_athlete
title: Get basic data of an athlete that finish Boston Marathon. — boston_athlete
text: boston_athlete() function uses results_boston database get information athlete finish Boston Marathon 2009 2022.

title: Get basic data of an athlete that finish Boston Marathon. — boston_athlete
Get basic data of an athlete that finish Boston Marathon. — boston_athlete
text: athlete Year event occured (string).

title: Get basic data of an athlete that finish Boston Marathon. — boston_athlete
text: ggplot2 plot density athletes (y-axis) finishing times (x-axis).

title: Get basic data of an athlete that finish Boston Marathon. — boston_athlete
code: boston_athlete(athlete = "Kipruto") #> # A tibble: 3 × 5 #>    year full_name      age_on_race_day rank_over_gender official_time #>   <int> <chr>                    <dbl>            <dbl> <hms>         #> 1  2022 Benson Kipruto              31                3 7647 secs     #> 2  2021 Benson Kipruto              30                1 7791 secs     #> 3  2019 Benson Kipruto              28               10 7793 secs     boston_athlete(athlete = "Benson Kipruto") #> # A tibble: 3 × 5 #>    year full_name      age_on_race_day rank_over_gender official_time #>   <int> <chr>                    <dbl>            <dbl> <hms>         #> 1  2022 Benson Kipruto              31                3 7647 secs     #> 2  2021 Benson Kipruto              30                1 7791 secs     #> 3  2019 Benson Kipruto              28               10 7793 secs

what: Get summary information about countries in Boston Marathon. — boston_country
title: Get summary information about countries in Boston Marathon. — boston_country
text: boston_country() function uses results_boston database get information countries representants edition Boston Marathon 2009 2022.

title: Get summary information about countries in Boston Marathon. — boston_country
Get summary information about countries in Boston Marathon. — boston_country
text: gender Gender athlete (string). year Year event occured (string). country Country origin athlete (string).

title: Get summary information about countries in Boston Marathon. — boston_country
text: dataframe 7 column gender, year event, country origin athlete, number finishers country, mean age finishers, fastest time slowest time.

title: Get summary information about countries in Boston Marathon. — boston_country
code: boston_country(gender = "both", year = 2021:2022, country = c("Brazil", "Kenya")) #> Warning: There was 1 warning in `dplyr::filter()`. #> ℹ In argument: `&...`. #> Caused by warning in `CountryOfCtzName == country`: #> ! longer object length is not a multiple of shorter object length #> # A tibble: 8 × 7 #>   gender  year country_of_ctz_name n_athletes mean_age fastest_time slowest_time #>   <chr>  <int> <chr>                    <int>    <dbl> <Period>     <Period>     #> 1 Female  2022 Brazil                      53     44.6 3H 9M 17S    5H 48M 49S   #> 2 Female  2022 Kenya                        6     32.3 2H 21M 1S    3H 44M 34S   #> 3 Male    2022 Brazil                      95     46.6 2H 40M 14S   6H 23M 26S   #> 4 Male    2022 Kenya                        4     34.2 2H 6M 51S    2H 31M 6S    #> 5 Female  2021 Brazil                       8     45.1 3H 17M 4S    5H 27M 54S   #> 6 Female  2021 Kenya                        5     33.6 2H 25M 9S    2H 38M 5S    #> 7 Male    2021 Brazil                      12     43.8 2H 49M 43S   5H 55M 34S   #> 8 Male    2021 Kenya                        7     32.6 2H 9M 51S    2H 28M 55S   boston_country(gender = "Female", year = 2022, country = "Kenya") #> # A tibble: 1 × 7 #>   gender  year country_of_ctz_name n_athletes mean_age fastest_time slowest_time #>   <chr>  <int> <chr>                    <int>    <dbl> <Period>     <Period>     #> 1 Female  2022 Kenya                        8     31.1 2H 21M 1S    3H 44M 34S   boston_country(gender = "Male", year = 2009, country = "United States of America") #> # A tibble: 1 × 7 #>   gender  year country_of_ctz_name n_athletes mean_age fastest_time slowest_time #>   <chr>  <int> <chr>                    <int>    <dbl> <Period>     <Period>     #> 1 Male    2009 United States of A…      10834     42.4 2H 9M 40S    7H 31M 36S

what: Plot density of participants over finishing time in Boston Marathon. — boston_density_ridges
title: Plot density of participants over finishing time in Boston Marathon. — boston_density_ridges
text: boston_density_ridges() function uses results_boston database plot density plot (based package "ggridges") finishing times Boston Marathon 2009 2022. function needs least two years graph plotted properly.

title: Plot density of participants over finishing time in Boston Marathon. — boston_density_ridges
Plot density of participants over finishing time in Boston Marathon. — boston_density_ridges
text: year Year event occured (string). range_position Range positions ploted (string).

title: Plot density of participants over finishing time in Boston Marathon. — boston_density_ridges
text: dataframe 5 column year event, full name athlete, age race day, finishing position gender official.

title: Plot density of participants over finishing time in Boston Marathon. — boston_density_ridges
code: boston_density_ridges(year = 2012:2019, range_position = 1:10) #> Picking joint bandwidth of 74.7

what: Find who finished in a certain position of Boston Marathon — boston_position
title: Find who finished in a certain position of Boston Marathon — boston_position
text: boston_position() function uses results_boston database find finished certain position male female Boston Marathons 2009 2022.

title: Find who finished in a certain position of Boston Marathon — boston_position
Find who finished in a certain position of Boston Marathon — boston_position
text: gender Gender athlete (string). year Year event occured (string). position Position athlete finished race (integer).

title: Find who finished in a certain position of Boston Marathon — boston_position
text: dataframe 7 column year event, name athlete, age race day, gender, country citizenship, official time finishing rank gender.

title: Find who finished in a certain position of Boston Marathon — boston_position
code: boston_position(gender = "both", year = 2021:2022, position = 1:3) #> # A tibble: 12 × 7 #>     year full_name      age_on_race_day gender country_of_ctz_name official_time #>    <int> <chr>                    <dbl> <chr>  <chr>               <Period>      #>  1  2022 Evans Chebet                33 Male   Kenya               2H 6M 51S     #>  2  2022 Lawrence Cher…              33 Male   Kenya               2H 7M 21S     #>  3  2022 Benson Kipruto              31 Male   Kenya               2H 7M 27S     #>  4  2022 Peres Jepchir…              28 Female Kenya               2H 21M 1S     #>  5  2022 Ababel Yeshan…              30 Female Ethiopia            2H 21M 5S     #>  6  2022 Mary Ngugi                  33 Female Kenya               2H 21M 32S    #>  7  2021 Benson Kipruto              30 Male   Kenya               2H 9M 51S     #>  8  2021 Lemi Berhanu                27 Male   Ethiopia            2H 10M 37S    #>  9  2021 Jemal Yimer                 38 Male   Ethiopia            2H 10M 38S    #> 10  2021 Diana Kipyokei              27 Female Kenya               2H 24M 45S    #> 11  2021 Edna Kiplagat               41 Female Kenya               2H 25M 9S     #> 12  2021 Mary Ngugi                  32 Female Kenya               2H 25M 20S    #> # ℹ 1 more variable: rank_over_gender <dbl> boston_position(gender = "Female", year = c(2010, 2021:2022), position = 1) #> # A tibble: 3 × 7 #>    year full_name       age_on_race_day gender country_of_ctz_name official_time #>   <int> <chr>                     <dbl> <chr>  <chr>               <Period>      #> 1  2022 Peres Jepchirc…              28 Female Kenya               2H 21M 1S     #> 2  2021 Diana Kipyokei               27 Female Kenya               2H 24M 45S    #> 3  2010 Teyba Erkesso                27 Female Ethiopia            2H 26M 11S    #> # ℹ 1 more variable: rank_over_gender <dbl> boston_position(gender = "Male", year = 2009, position = 1:10) #> # A tibble: 10 × 7 #>     year full_name      age_on_race_day gender country_of_ctz_name official_time #>    <int> <chr>                    <dbl> <chr>  <chr>               <Period>      #>  1  2009 Deriba Merga                28 Male   Ethiopia            2H 8M 42S     #>  2  2009 Daniel Rono                 30 Male   Kenya               2H 9M 32S     #>  3  2009 Ryan Hall                   26 Male   United States of A… 2H 9M 40S     #>  4  2009 Tekeste Kebede              27 Male   Ethiopia            2H 9M 49S     #>  5  2009 Robert Cherui…              20 Male   Kenya               2H 10M 6S     #>  6  2009 Gashaw Asfaw                30 Male   Ethiopia            2H 10M 44S    #>  7  2009 Solomon Molla               22 Male   Ethiopia            2H 12M 2S     #>  8  2009 Evans Cheruiy…              26 Male   Kenya               2H 12M 45S    #>  9  2009 Stephen Kiogo…              34 Male   Kenya               2H 13M 0S     #> 10  2009 Timothy Cheri…              32 Male   Kenya               2H 13M 4S     #> # ℹ 1 more variable: rank_over_gender <dbl>

what: Get a summary stats of the participants of the Boston Marathon — boston_summary
title: Get a summary stats of the participants of the Boston Marathon — boston_summary
text: boston_summary() function uses results_boston database get stats participants certain edition Boston Marathon 2009 2022.

title: Get a summary stats of the participants of the Boston Marathon — boston_summary
Get a summary stats of the participants of the Boston Marathon — boston_summary
text: gender Gender athlete (string). year Year event occured (string).

title: Get a summary stats of the participants of the Boston Marathon — boston_summary
text: dataframe 7 column gender, year event, number finishers, mean age finishers, number countries representants event, fastest time (champion) slowest time.

title: Get a summary stats of the participants of the Boston Marathon — boston_summary
code: boston_summary(gender = "Male", year = 2021:2022) #> # A tibble: 2 × 7 #>   gender  year n_finishers mean_age n_countries fastest_time slowest_time #>   <chr>  <int>       <int>    <dbl>       <int> <Period>     <Period>     #> 1 Male    2022       14262     45.0         107 2H 6M 51S    7H 24M 39S   #> 2 Male    2021        7942     46.7          86 2H 9M 51S    7H 51M 35S   boston_summary(gender = "Female", year = 2021) #> # A tibble: 1 × 7 #>   gender  year n_finishers mean_age n_countries fastest_time slowest_time #>   <chr>  <int>       <int>    <dbl>       <int> <Period>     <Period>     #> 1 Female  2021        7444     43.0          64 2H 24M 45S   7H 33M 22S   boston_summary(gender = "both", year = c(2009, 2021:2022)) #> # A tibble: 6 × 7 #>   gender  year n_finishers mean_age n_countries fastest_time slowest_time #>   <chr>  <int>       <int>    <dbl>       <int> <Period>     <Period>     #> 1 Female  2022       10572     41.4          84 2H 21M 1S    6H 49M 43S   #> 2 Male    2022       14262     45.0         107 2H 6M 51S    7H 24M 39S   #> 3 Female  2021        7444     43.0          64 2H 24M 45S   7H 33M 22S   #> 4 Male    2021        7942     46.7          86 2H 9M 51S    7H 51M 35S   #> 5 Female  2009        9298     38.0          54 2H 32M 16S   7H 16M 3S    #> 6 Male    2009       13545     43.0          70 2H 8M 42S    7H 31M 36S

title: Results of Boston Marathon — results_boston
text: Results finishers Boston Marathon 2009 2022.

title: Results of Boston Marathon — results_boston
Results of Boston Marathon — results_boston
text: dataframe : Year Year event FullName Full name athlete AgeOnRaceDay Age athlete race day Gender Gender athlete City City residence athlete StateName State residence athlete Zip Zipcode residence athlete CountryOfResAbbrev Abbreviation country residence athlete CountryOfResName Country residence athlete CountryOfCtzAbbrev Abbreviation country citizenship athlete CountryOfCtzName Country citizenship athlete OfficialTime Official finihsing time athlete RankOverall Overal finishing rank athlete RankOverGender Finishing rank gender athlete RankOverDivision Finishing rank division athlete SubGroupLabel Subgroup label athlete SubGroup Subgroup description athlete

title: Results of Boston Marathon — results_boston
text: http://registration.baa.org
